name: Avocado Juice
description: The avocado, also known as butter pear or alligator pear, is a fruit that is widely acknowledged to have properties that reduce cholesterol levels in the body. To top it off, it's absolutely delicious. so this is avocado juice recipe
directions: To make the simple syrup, combine the sugar and water in a small saucepan over medium to high heat
Stir until clear. Remove from heat and let cool.
Spoon out the avocado pulp and place in a blender
Add the syrup and blend to mix, then add cold milk and blend.
Divide the mixture between two tall glasses.
Top each serving with ½ cup chocolate milk (to form a separate layer) and crushed ice
